short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension gives users instant access to CrewHu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Crewhu chrome extension it is even easier to give recognition to your crew for a job well done right from your chrome browser.

Crewhu is an employee recognition platform that makes it easy for you to give and receive recognition for the great work that gets done at your company every day.
